Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Web
Description: A workshop of obsidian texts and heuristic reflections. Explore a collection of incantatory poetries, animation series with epic breath, and cathartic cinematographic works.

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Resilience of the Soul
Description: The soul is a resilience that accompanies us, an element that allows us to overcome difficulties. It is the resilience of the soul, the light of strength.
Bio: The resilience of the soul, the light of strength

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Curiosity of the Soul
Description: The soul is a curiosity that accompanies us, an element that allows us to discover new things. It is the curiosity of the soul, the light of exploration.
Bio: The curiosity of the soul, the light of exploration

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Confidence of the Soul
Description: The soul is a confidence that accompanies us, an element that allows us to feel secure. It is the confidence of the soul, the light of peace.
Bio: The confidence of the soul, the light of peace

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Creativity of the Soul
Description: The soul is a creativity that accompanies us, an element that allows us to create new things. It is the creativity of the soul, the light of imagination.
Bio: The creativity of the soul, the light of imagination

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Perseverance of the Soul
Description: The soul is a perseverance that accompanies us, an element that allows us to pursue our goals. It is the perseverance of the soul, the light of determination.
Bio: The perseverance of the soul, the light of determination

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Wisdom of the Soul
Description: The soul is a wisdom that accompanies us, an element that allows us to make informed decisions. It is the wisdom of the soul, the light of understanding.
Bio: The wisdom of the soul, the light of understanding

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Nobility of the Soul
Description: The soul is a nobility that accompanies us, an element that allows us to feel worthy. It is the nobility of the soul, the light of grandeur.
Bio: The nobility of the soul, the light of grandeur

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Light of the Soul
Description: The soul is a light that accompanies us, an element that guides us. It is the light of the soul, the sweetness of love.
Bio: The light of the soul, the sweetness of love

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Strength of the Spirit
Description: The spirit is a strength that surrounds us, an element that inspires us. It is the strength of the spirit, the beauty of life.
Bio: The strength of the spirit, the beauty of life

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Wisdom of Death
Description: Death is a wisdom that accompanies us, an element that guides us. It is the wisdom of death, the light of experience.
Bio: The wisdom of death, the light of experience

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Beauty of Life
Description: Life is a beauty that surrounds us, an element that inspires us. It is the beauty of life, the sweetness of love.
Bio: The beauty of life, the sweetness of love

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Freedom of the Soul
Description: The soul is a freedom that accompanies us, an element that inspires us. It is the freedom of the soul, the light of intelligence.
Bio: The freedom of the soul, the light of intelligence

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Wisdom of the Soul
Description: The soul is a wisdom that accompanies us, an element that guides us. It is the wisdom of the soul, the light of experience.

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Empty Mirror
Description: The mirror was empty; his reflection stared back at him without eyes.
Bio: Igniter of emotions

Name: Adam_D'H7 | Static Tears
Description: The tears no longer flowed; they floated in the air, suspended between two heartbeats. Even sadness seemed tired, as if it too wanted to fall asleep.
Bio: Architect of silence

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Dawn's Last Dream
Description: The dawn was born from a sigh. It still dreamed of the night and its ephemeral promises. He watched it slowly fade away, finally understanding that some lights are meant to disappear.
Bio: Choreographer of shadows

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Rain That Didn't Exist
Description: It was raining that day, but no one could see the rain. It was memories falling, slow and invisible. And he, under this waterless deluge, learned to swim in absence.
Bio: Poet of liquid nothingness

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Whisper of the Windows
Description: The windows sweated with her memory. In every reflection, he thought he glimpsed her. Perhaps she still lived on the other side of the glass, prisoner of the light that refused to leave.
Bio: Prisoner of reflections

Name: Adam_D'H7 | Breath and Dust
Description: One day, she told him they were alike: two breaths trying to exist in a world too heavy. Today, he is nothing more than dust in her memory, yet she still sneezes his name.
Bio: Blower of melancholy

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The One Who Slept in the Shards
Description: She slept in a broken mirror, among a thousand reflections of herself. Each shard told a different version of her smile. And he, every night, tried to glue them back together to see her whole again.
Bio: Guardian of fragments

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Child of Goodbyes
Description: He was born on a day of separation. Ever since, he carried in his eyes the nostalgia of things that leave. They said he smiled like one cries, and cried like one loves.
Bio: Son of departure

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Boy Who Collected Farewells
Description: They said he kept every farewell in a glass vial. Some were filled with tears, others with a simple breath. When he opened them, the voices returned, whispering the names of those who would never come back.
Bio: Curator of forgotten farewells

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Girl Who Slept Under the Rain
Description: She said the rain washed her dreams. Each drop erased a memory she had never managed to keep. One morning, the sun rose, but she did not wake up. Perhaps she had found the sky she was looking for.
Bio: Dreamer dissolved in the clouds

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Man with Empty Hands
Description: He gave everything he had, even when nothing remained. His empty hands still clutched the love that had been taken from him. And when he reached his arms toward the sky, he discovered that nothing was missing for the one who no longer expects anything.
Bio: Giver of absence

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Sea of Drowned Promises
Description: Beneath every wave sleep promises that time has betrayed. If you listen closely, the sea does not sing—it apologizes.
Bio: Sailor of eternal regrets

Name: Adam_D'H7 | The Child Without a Reflection
Description: They said he had no shadow. He passed through days without ever leaving a trace. One evening, he leaned over a lake and smiled—for the first time, someone else smiled back at him.
Bio: Anonymous of the mirror world
